body:
So I saw Nemo make a post about the Premier League ages ago and I saw Sayah's one about the Champions Leauge so why not make one about Euro 2016 which kicks off on 10th June 2016.

Who are you supporting? Personally England obv but I want Germany to win

Which countries do you think will be competing in the final? Germany v Spain?

Who do you think will dominate the tournament?

Who do you think will win?

title: Euro 2016!
